name: Swarm of Bats
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.Echolocation: The swarm can't use its blindsight while deafened.
traits.Keen Hearing: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
traits.Swarm: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
